page.title: 07Transport
page.content:
The main Lichfield-Birmingham road passes North to South through the east of the block, and the Chester Road-Castle Bromwich to Brownhills is just to the west of the block. These are linked by several East West roads and a network of country lanes giving good road transport. There are several bus routes linking the block with Birmingham, Lichfield,Derby, Aldridge,Walsall and Sutton Coldfield.
The Lichfield- Birmingham railway line has been improved as far as Blake Street and there is a good service much used by commuters.A cheap Railcard can be used from Blake Street Station throughout West Midlands area, and also on the West Midlands bus routes, as this is the boundary of West Midlands.
